insert.foreach: insert into dr_product_invest_repayinfo (uid, investId, pid, shouldPrincipal, shouldInterest, status, shouldTime,basicprofit) values (#{item.uid}, #{item.investId}, #{item.pid},#{item.shouldPrincipal},#{item.shouldInterest},#{item.status},#{item.shouldTime},#{item.basicprofit})

mapper.select: select * from dr_product_invest_repayinfo where pid = #{pid} and status = 0 and DATE_FORMAT(shouldTime,'%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(SYSDATE(),'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.update: update dr_product_invest_repayinfo set factPrincipal = #{factPrincipal}, factInterest = #{factInterest}, status = #{status}, factTime = #{factTime}, remitMchntTxnSsn = #{remitMchntTxnSsn}, remit_status = #{remitStatus}, remit_fail_reson = #{remitFailReson}, mchntPay = #{mchntPay} where id = #{id}

update dr_product_invest_repayinfo pir LEFT JOIN dr_product_info_repay_detail pidetail on pidetail.pid = pir.pid and pir.shouldtime = pidetail.shouldtime set pir.pdId = pidetail.id where pidetail.id is not NULL and pidetail.pid = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,b.type AS productType ,b.project_no as project_no FROM `dr_product_invest_repayinfo` a LEFT JOIN dr_product_info b ON a.pid = b.id where b.type =2 and b.project_no = 'jzh' and NOW() > a.shouldTime and a.transfer_status = 3 UNION ALL SELECT a.*,b.type AS productType ,b.project_no as project_no FROM `dr_product_invest_repayinfo` a LEFT JOIN dr_product_info b ON a.pid = b.id where b.type =5 and a.shouldTime > '2017-06-08' and NOW() > a.shouldTime and a.transfer_status = 3

set @rowNO=0; select @rowNO := @rowNO+1 as num, case when (dpir.factPrincipal=0) then dpir.shouldPrincipal else dpir.factPrincipal end as shouldPrincipal, case when (dpir.factInterest=0) then dpir.shouldInterest else dpir.factInterest end as shouldInterest, DATE_FORMAT(dpir.shouldTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as shouldTime,case dpir.status when 0 then '未还款' when 1 then '已还款' when 3 then '逾期' END as status from dr_product_invest_repayinfo dpir where dpir.investId=#{investId} order by dpir.shouldTime asc

select case when sum(dpir.shouldPrincipal) is null then 0 else sum(dpir.shouldPrincipal) end as residueprincipal, case when sum(dpir.shouldInterest) is null then 0 else sum(dpir.shouldInterest) end as residueinterest from dr_product_invest_repayinfo dpir where dpir.investId=#{investId} and dpir.status=0

select case when sum(dpir.factPrincipal) is null then 0 else sum(dpir.factPrincipal) end as factPrincipal, case when sum(dpir.factInterest) is null then 0 else sum(dpir.factInterest) end as factInterest from dr_product_invest_repayinfo dpir where dpir.investId=#{investId} and dpir.status=1
select count(0) from dr_product_invest_repayinfo where pid = #{pid} and status = 1
